articles.author: Dakin Andone, CNN
articles.title: A Texas death row inmate is seeking a 30-day reprieve to donate a kidney. An appeals court has issued an execution stay for a different reason
articles.description: A Texas death row inmate -- who recently asked the governor for a 30-day delay of his execution so he can make a kidney donation -- has been granted a stay for a different reason, the state's appeals court announced Monday.

articles.title: Video: Webb telescope's first image relased by NASA - CNN Video
articles.description: NASA has released an image from the James Webb Space Telescope showing the deepest view of the universe ever captured. The image shows SMACS 0723, where a massive group of galaxy clusters act as a magnifying glass for the objects behind them.

articles.title: Watch: CNN obtains unseen footage of Trump talking efforts to overturn Georgia election results - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Jake Tapper talks with documentary filmmaker Alex Holder who had behind-the-scenes access to the Trump White House and family for his docuseries "Unprecedented."

articles.title: Opinion: new space photos will reveal secrets of the universe
articles.description: The James Webb Space Telescope -- the largest space telescope ever built -- will give humanity a new view of space and fundamentally alter our understanding of the universe, writes NASA Administrator Bill Nelson.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: President Biden will share the Webb Telescope's first image today
articles.description: President Joe Biden will share the first image from the James Webb Space Telescope on Monday at the White House at 5 p.m. ET. The rest of Webb's first images will be released on Tuesday.
